title: Why does the family decide not to get a dog

content.question: Why does the family decide not to get a dog?

choices.label: They believe dogs are not very quiet.
No one wants to walk the dog every day.
One of the family members is allergic to dogs.
They believe dogs are not very independent.

content.answer: No one wants to walk the dog every day.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
